actions.name: get_state
actions.description: Get CRM snapshot (boards, customers, deals, projects, meetings, templates, content)

actions.name: create_or_update_customer
actions.description: Create or update a customer. Include 'id' in body to update.

actions.name: delete_customer
actions.description: Delete a customer by ID. Body: {"id": "uuid"}

actions.name: create_meeting
actions.description: Create a meeting room. Returns room_code and room_url.

actions.name: list_templates
actions.description: List templates with optional ?type= (contract|proposal|invoice|email) and ?category= filters

actions.name: create_or_update_template
actions.description: Create or update a template. Supports placeholders: {{client_name}}, {{company_name}}, {{company_address}}, {{client_email}}, {{date}}. Body: {"name": "...", "type": "contract", "body_html": "..."}

actions.name: delete_template
actions.description: Delete a template by ID. Body: {"id": "uuid"}

actions.name: list_content
actions.description: List content assets with optional ?customer_id=, ?source= (dashboard|google-drive|instagram|sms|client-direct|other), ?type=, ?category= filters

actions.name: create_or_update_content
actions.description: Create or update a content asset. Fields: title, type (article|image|video|landing_page|doc|post), source (dashboard|google-drive|instagram|sms|client-direct|other), customer_id, status, url, folder, tags, body, scheduled_for. Send id to update.

actions.name: delete_content
actions.description: Delete a content asset by ID. Body: {"id": "uuid"}
